name: Ramesh PVK
text:
I think the response is being committed before you pass back the modified XML. 

To know the reasons why the response was committed , [Look here][1]

If you do not want to get the response committed, you should be doing these two things:

 - Increase the JSP buffer size in page directive
            
       **<%@ page buffer="5kb" autoFlush="false" %>**

 - Increase the server default max buffer size.
   
       **ServletRespnse.setBufferSize()**
  [1]: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11305563/cause-of-servlets-response-already-committed/11305612#11305612
